title: Educommunication Strategies for Strengthening Knowledge-Based Content Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A systematic course for current science professionals to enhance knowledge-based content management capabilities in a mobile environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of information and digital literacy for knowledge-based content management.
Learners can design a process for effectively collecting/analyzing scientific data and converting it into web content.
Learners can establish team-based knowledge-sharing systems using edcommunication tools (collaboration platforms, content management systems, etc.).
Learners can apply data literacy to reconstruct scientific research findings into visual and interactive content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
